subject: Order #SSN3463 missing haptic motors
description_text:
Hello, I recently recieved my new set of simsonn pedals, but the haptic
motors that I ordered were missing from the package.

conversations.body_text: Hi Josh Peavy,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. Here is another tracking link for your shipment:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047049655735
